1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Phoebe, Monica, and Rachel are sitting around the
kitchen table as Ross enters.

lines.Line:
Hey uh Mon, I saw the Porsche parked out front, can I get the keys?
Thought I’d take that bad boy out for a little spin

Wait a minute! (To Monica) You let Ross drive the Porsche and
when I ask you, you say you’re the only one who’s allowed to drive it

Yeah, well he’s my brother! And plus he drives so slow he could
never hurt it
It’s a car Monica! Not a rocket ship
It’s a car Monica! Not a rocket ship
It’s a car Monica! Not a rocket ship

Whatever Ross! Just replace the bulbs in the brake lights after
you’re done

Saw the Porsche out there Mon, lookin’ good. When do I get to take
that baby out again

I’ve never driven it! Okay? Not once! Okay once. Okay, I drive it
all the time

Nice work everybody! So much for the y’know, "You can drive
it, but don’t tell Rachel" plan
Wow! I can’t believe you lied to me
Wow! I can’t believe you lied to me

Okay, I can fix this! Okay Monica, Rachel thinks all you can talk about
is the wedding. (Rachel glares at her.

Great! Well Rachel, the reason why I won’t let you drive the
Porsche is because you’re a terrible driver. There! That wasn’t about the
wedding

Look Rach if-if you want to go for a ride in the Porsche I’ll be glad
to take you for a quick spin around the block
Yeah, you got a couple hours
Yeah, you got a couple hours
Yeah, you got a couple hours

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica and Phoebe are counting the invitations as
Chandler exits from the bathroom.

lines.Line: Chandler, we still haven’t gotten an RSVP from your dad

Oh! Right. Umm, maybe that’s because I didn’t send him an
invitation
Chandler! He’s your father; he should be at the wedding

I don’t even know the man. Okay? We’re not that close. I
haven’t seen him in years
Well what are you gonna do when he finds out he wasn’t even asked?
Well what are you gonna do when he finds out he wasn’t even asked?

Well he doesn’t have to know! It’s not like we run in the
same circles. I hang out with you guys, and he stars in a drag show in Vegas
Ooh, I think I wanna trade circles
Ooh, I think I wanna trade circles

Trust me, you don’t want him there either. Okay? Nobody is gonna
be staring at the bride when the father of the groom is wearing a back-less dress

So what! As long as he’s not wearing a white dress and a veil I
don’t care
Okay, I think I need to do some shopping. (Gets up and leaves.

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey and Phoebe are on the couch as a man enters.

lines.Line:
Yeah! Sure! Ooh, I left my purse up at Monica’s. I’ll be right
back. (She goes to get it.

What? (He leans in to kiss her.) Oh. (They kiss and Phoebe pauses.) Ooh.
(Pause) Whoa! That one kept going. (Exits.
So! You and Phoebe huh? How long have you been going out

Wow! Maybe uh, maybe you and I ought to get to know each other a little
better
Joey. (They shake hands.) Hey Jake, do you like the Knicks
Me too! There’s a game on Tuesday, do you wanna go

Yeah that would be great! Let me make sure I’m not doing anything
Tuesday. (He bends over to open his bag, when he does so his pants slide down his butt
revealing a pink lace secret.

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe is there as Joey enters.

lines.Line:
Listen, you know how uh, when you’re wearing pants and you lean
forward I check out your underwear

Well, when Jake did it I saw that…he was wearing women’s
underwear
Oh. (Laughs.) No! No wait, that’s weird

No, it’s not! We were just goofing around and I dared him to try
them on
I’m wearing his briefs right now
I think so too. And that little flap? Great for holding my lipstick
Yeah, I wouldn’t know about that
Yeah, I wouldn’t know about that

And! Y’know what Jake says? That women’s underwear is actually
more comfortable. And he loves the way the silk feels against his skin

Yeah well next thing you know, he’ll be telling you that your high
heels are good for his posture

There is nothing wrong with Jake! Okay? He is all man! I’m thinking
even more than you
Oh yeah, he looked like a real lumberjack in those pink lacys
Oh yeah, he looked like a real lumberjack in those pink lacys

I’m just saying that only a man completely secure with his
masculinity could walk around in women’s underwear! I don’t think you could ever
do that
Hey! I am secure with my masculinity
Hey! I am secure with my masculinity
You’ve seen my huge stack of porn, right? (Phoebe nods.

5.SceneDescription:
Joey and Rachel's, Joey is walking from the bathroom to his bedroom and walks
past a pile of Rachel’s laundry, which just happens to include a selection of
panties. He stops, goes back to the basket, looks for Rachel, picks up a lavender thong,
and heads for his bedroom. However, he decides he doesn’t like his selection and goes
back this time picking up a red low-cut silk brief and heads for his room, flexing along
the way to prove his masculinity.

6.SceneDescription:
The Porsche, they have pulled over and are waiting for the cop to come talk to
them.

lines.Line:
Okay. Switch places with me! Switch places with me! Come on! I’ll
go under, you go over
Yeah, I’ll get right on that

Oh come on Ross!! (She tries to switch places with him and goes under
his leg.

No Rach! Come on! No-no! Yeah, I’m sure we won’t get arrested
for this

lines.Character: (She sits back up as the policeman approaches. She undoes her top button
lines.Line: She sits back up as the policeman approaches. She undoes her top button.

lines.Character: (She sits back up as the policeman approaches. She undoes her top button
lines.Line: She sits back up as the policeman approaches. She undoes her top button.
(sexily) Hi officer, was I going a little too fast
Can I see your license please

Oh yes, absolutely! Y’know, it’s weird uh, but I had a dream
last night where I was stopped by a policeman. And then he uh…well I probably
shouldn’t tell you the rest
(handing it to him) Yes. Here you go Officer uh, Handsome
Really?! You think so? Y’know, I had just rolled out of bed
Well she should, it was taken ten years ago

Y’know you’re-you’re probably wondering about the old
date on there
I knew it! I knew it, ahh…
You’re not gonna speed anymore right
And you promise you’ll get this taken care of right away
And in the meantime you better let him drive. Does he have a license

7.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe is sitting on the couch as Joey enters strutting.

lines.Line: Hey Pheebs! (He sits down next to her.

Check it out. (He turns around, pulls down his pants, and shows Phoebe
that he’s got panties on.) How much of a man am I?
Wow! Nice! Manly and also kind of a slut
Y’know, I’m beginning to see what Jake was talking about
Y’know, I’m beginning to see what Jake was talking about

Yeah! And-and things aren’t as…smashed down as I thought they
were gonna be

Bikini, French cut, thong! And-and the fabrics! You’ve got cotton,
silk, lace! And y’know what I’ve always wondered about

Bikini, French cut, thong! And-and the fabrics! You’ve got cotton,
silk, lace! And y’know what I’ve always wondered about

Bikini, French cut, thong! And-and the fabrics! You’ve got cotton,
silk, lace! And y’know what I’ve always wondered about

Pantyhose! Y’know? The way they start at your toe and go all the way
up to here… (He mimed that and stops when he realizes he went too far.) I should go
take these off shouldn’t I
I think it’s important that you do

lines.Character: (Joey agrees and heads to take them off
lines.Line: Joey agrees and heads to take them off.

8.SceneDescription:
The Porsche, cars are whizzing by and honking their horns on both sides very
quickly as Ross creeps along.

lines.Line: Remind me to introduce you to someone
What?! What does he want?! I wasn’t doing anything

Well maybe he saw your hand slip briefly from the ten and two
o’clock position

Maybe it’s uh Sergeant Sagittarius coming back to flirt some more!
(They pull over.
Do you know how fast you were traveling back there
Ah no. I don’t, but it could not have been more than sixty

I mean you’re not gonna give me a-a ticket for driving too slow are
ya

lines.Character: (There’s a pause as Ross gets suddenly flirtatious
lines.Line: There’s a pause as Ross gets suddenly flirtatious.
Y’know of-officer I uh…I had the weirdest dream last night

(laughs) You don’t-you don’t want to hear about my dream
Officer…Pretty

It’s Petty. (He grabs Ross’s license.) I’ll be right
back with your ticket. (Walks back to his car.
